name: StarPlay
description: STPC is the STO Token issued by StarPlay through the blockbuster technology to prevent tampering, decentralization, transparency and disclosure, to ensure fair, open and fair in the voting, decision-making, investigation, evaluation and other scenarios, to avoid voting and other results are interfered by the outside world. To make the vote more credible. Starplay was created to give back to fans' love and passion. The slogan is "Create a comprehensive experience for fans." We have created a full range of experiences for fans. StarPaly is a fan platform that incorporates 1 million registered users of the company's already operated "STARPASS" and also runs the music competition ranking program of the official Korean television station (SBS/KBS). Fans can vote freely by creating a wallet and freely purchasing voting rights on the StarPlay operating platform.
